alert.note: Alert for Cotton; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 02 at 2:16PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Cotton, southeastern Tillman, northwestern Archer, Wichita, southeastern Wilbarger and northeastern Baylor Counties through 245 PM CST... At 216 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Iowa Park, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Western Wichita Falls, Burkburnett, Iowa Park, Electra, Holliday, Grandfield, Randlett, Devol, Cookietown, Lake Diversion, Dundee, Mankins, Lake Kickapoo, Sheppard AFB, Pleasant Valley, Haynesville and Cashion. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 0 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
